verses.verse: And the <S%G3991>fifth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded,<s%> and I <S%G3708>saw<s%> a <S%G792>star<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> which had <S%G4098>fallen<s%> to the <S%G1093>earth;<s%> and the <S%G2807>key<s%> of the <S%G12>bottomless<s%> <S%G5421>pit<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to him.

And he <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G12>bottomless<s%> <S%G5421>pit;<s%> and <S%G2586>smoke<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> up out of the <S%G5421>pit,<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2575>furnace;<s%> and the <S%G2246>sun<s%> and the <S%G109>air<s%> were <S%G4656>darkened<s%> by the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of the <S%G5421>pit.<s%>

And out of the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> <S%G1831>forth<s%> <S%G200>locusts<s%> upon the <S%G1093>earth;<s%> and <S%G1849>power<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> them, as the <S%G4651>scorpions<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power.<s%>

And they were <S%G3004>told<s%> that they should not <S%G91>hurt<s%> the <S%G5528>grass<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G5515>green<s%> <S%G5515>thing,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G1186>tree,<s%> but <S%G1487>only<s%> <S%G3361><s%> the <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> do not <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G4973>seal<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> on their <S%G3359>foreheads.<s%>

And they were not <S%G1325>permitted<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G846>anyone,<s%> but to <S%G928>torment<s%> for <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G3376>months;<s%> and their <S%G929>torment<s%> was <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G929>torment<s%> of a <S%G4651>scorpion<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> it <S%G3817>stings<s%> a <S%G444>man.<s%>

And in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> will <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> and will not <S%G2147>find<s%> it; and they will <S%G1937>long<s%> to <S%G599>die<s%> and <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G5343>flees<s%> from them.

And the <S%G3667>appearance<s%> of the <S%G200>locusts<s%> was <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G2462>horses<s%> <S%G2090>prepared<s%> for <S%G4171>battle;<s%> and on their <S%G2776>heads,<s%> as it were, <S%G4735>crowns<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G5557>gold,<s%> and their <S%G4383>faces<s%> were <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G4383>faces<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>
And they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2359>hair<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G2359>hair<s%> of <S%G1135>women,<s%> and their <S%G3599>teeth<s%> were <S%G5613>like<s%> [the teeth] of <S%G3023>lions.<s%>

And they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2382>breastplates<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G2382>breastplates<s%> of <S%G4603>iron;<s%> and the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of their <S%G4420>wings<s%> was <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of <S%G716>chariots,<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2462>horses<s%> <S%G5143>rushing<s%> to <S%G4171>battle.<s%>

And they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3769>tails<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G4651>scorpions,<s%> and <S%G2759>stings;<s%> and in their <S%G3769>tails<s%> is their <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G91>hurt<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> for <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G3376>months.<s%>

They <S%G2192>have<s%> as <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> them, the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G12>abyss;<s%> his <S%G3686>name<s%> in <S%G1447>Hebrew<s%> is Abaddon, and in the <S%G3>Greek<s%> he <S%G1673>has<s%> the <S%G2192>name<s%> <S%G3686>Apollyon.<s%>

The <S%G1520>first<s%> <S%G3759>woe<s%> is <S%G565>past;<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3759>woes<s%> are <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>

And the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded,<s%> and I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> from the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> of the <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2379>altar<s%> which is <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>

one <S%G3004>saying<s%> to the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> who <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G4536>trumpet,<s%> <S%G3089>"Release<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> who are <S%G1210>bound<s%> at the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4215>river<s%> <S%G2166>Euphrates.<s%>"

And the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%> who had been <S%G2090>prepared<s%> for the <S%G5610>hour<s%> and <S%G2250>day<s%> and <S%G3376>month<s%> and <S%G1763>year,<s%> were <S%G3089>released,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that they might <S%G615>kill<s%> a <S%G5154>third<s%> of <S%G444>mankind.<s%>

And the <S%G706>number<s%> of the <S%G4753>armies<s%> of the <S%G2461>horsemen<s%> was <S%G7046>two<s%> <S%G3461><s%> <S%G7046>hundred<s%> <S%G3461><s%> <S%G7046>million<s%><S%G3461>;<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of them.

And <S%G3779>this<s%> is <S%G3779>how<s%> I <S%G3708>saw<s%> in the <S%G3706>vision<s%> the <S%G2462>horses<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2521>sat<s%> on them: [the riders] <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2382>breastplates<s%> [the color] of <S%G4447>fire<s%> and of <S%G5191>hyacinth<s%> and of <S%G2306>brimstone;<s%> and the <S%G2776>heads<s%> of the <S%G2462>horses<s%> are <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G2776>heads<s%> of <S%G3023>lions;<s%> and out of their <S%G4750>mouths<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> and <S%G2586>smoke<s%> and <S%G2303>brimstone.<s%>

A <S%G5154>third<s%> of <S%G444>mankind<s%> was <S%G615>killed<s%> by <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4127>plagues,<s%> by the <S%G4442>fire<s%> and the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> and the <S%G2303>brimstone,<s%> which <S%G1607>proceeded<s%> out of their <S%G4750>mouths.<s%>

For the <S%G1849>power<s%> of the <S%G2462>horses<s%> is in their <S%G4750>mouths<s%> and in their <S%G3769>tails;<s%> for their <S%G3769>tails<s%> are <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G3789>serpents<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2776>heads;<s%> and with them they <S%G91>do<s%> <S%G91>harm.<s%>

And the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of <S%G444>mankind,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> were not <S%G615>killed<s%> by <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G4127>plagues,<s%> did not <S%G3340>repent<s%> of the <S%G2041>works<s%> of their <S%G5495>hands,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> as not to <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1140>demons,<s%> and the <S%G1497>idols<s%> of <S%G5552>gold<s%> and of <S%G693>silver<s%> and of <S%G5470>brass<s%> and of <S%G3035>stone<s%> and of <S%G3585>wood,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G4043>walk;<s%>

and they did not <S%G3340>repent<s%> of their <S%G5408>murders<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> of their <S%G5331>sorceries<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> of their <S%G4202>immorality<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> of their <S%G2809>thefts.<s%>
